name: Pew Pew Squad
description:
🧟 In Pew Pew Squad, you're a lone survivor in a world overrun by the zombie apocalypse. Your mission? Take out the undead and earn a well-deserved reward for your heroic deeds. Use your earnings to get top-notch gear and ammo, increasing your odds of surviving the ever more challenging zombie hordes.

🇧🇷 This is an incredible indie game, created by a single Brazilian developer. Currently in Early Access, Pew Pew Squad is constantly evolving, with significant and thrilling updates on the horizon. Get ready for a world full of surprises and challenges!
